title: Fukigen na Mononokean (The Morose Mononokean)
synopsis: The start of Hanae Ashiya's high school career has not been easyâ€”he has spent all of the first week in the infirmary, and his inexplicable condition is only getting worse. The cause of his torment is the mysterious fuzzy creature that has attached itself to him ever since he stumbled upon it the day before school began.
